dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5861 RH: Building on Reemployment Improvements to Deliver Good Employment for Workers Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. LaHood (for himself and Mr. Davis of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on October 2, 2023

form.official-title: To extend reemployment services and eligibility assessments to all claimants for unemployment benefits, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Building on Reemployment Improvements to Deliver Good Employment for Workers Act or the BRIDGE for Workers Act.

subsection.text: Section 306(a) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 506(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking individuals referred to reemployment services as described in section 303(j) and inserting claimants for regular compensation, including claimants referred to reemployment services as described in section 303(j),; and
by striking such individuals and inserting such claimants.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall take effect on the date of enactment of this Act.

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
